summary: The "End Polluter Welfare Act of 2025" aims to eliminate various federal subsidies for fossil fuel production. It proposes changes across several areas including: royalty rates, tax expenditures (including deductions and credits), loan programs, and international financial institution funding. The bill also seeks to repeal recent legislation that supports fossil fuels and mandates studies on additional subsidies.  The ultimate goal is to disincentivize fossil fuel production and promote cleaner energy alternatives.
